isis.stitle: TSI 96-05-01 - Luk Model LF93, LF73 and VT73 Power Steering Pumps

subjectgroup.subject: Luk Model LF93, LF73 and VT73 Power Steering Pumps

geninfo.para: Luk Model LF93 power steering pump, Part Number 2005338-C91, used with I-6 engines and 14,000 lb. driving axles and all 16,000 lb. axles, is being replaced with Part Number 3514596-C91. The change is being implemented to prevent pump flow control valve bore distortion when the inlet fitting is over-tightened.

Luk Model LF93 power steering pump, Part Number 2005338-C91, used with 18,000 lb. axles in 2000, 5000 and 8000 Models, will be replaced with TRW Model PS-28, Part Number 3514681-C91. The TRW pump will be available for production January 1, 1997.

Luk Model VT73 power steering pump, used in hydraulic brake chassis applications, has had machining process changes to the flow control valve bore to increase the life of the pump. The changes took effect August, 1996 without part number change.

Luk Model LF73 power steering pump has a shaft and seal revision effective November 1, 1996 to enhance the low temperature performance, in addition to flow control valve bore machining process changes. The part number does not change.
